about_the_game:
What happened here? This is not the town and country I remember…

Fresh on the heels of the Plague Bringers comes an edited set of resources to really bring out the desolation, grime, and grunge of your blighted world. Inside are almost all of the Medieval: Town and Country and Medieval: Interiors tiles re-done in a grungy, broken-down, and diseased fashion.

Features:

  • 24 Re-worked tilesets from the Medieval: Town and Country and Medieval: Interiors packs.
  • 82 Pre-made buildings and castle pieces for a worn-down and gritty aesthetic.
  • This set greatly enhances the Medieval: Plague Bringer resources, as well as all other Medieval resources.
  • Read-Me and Instruction document.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Medieval: Diseased Town" and "RPG Maker MV - Medieval: Diseased Town" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
